mapper.select: SELECT PROMOTION_NAME AS 'promotionName', CASHVOUCHE_VALUE AS 'voucherValue', SATISFY_LIMIT AS 'satisfyLimit', COUNT(*) AS 'number', EFFECT_START_TIME AS 'startTime', EFFECT_END_TIME AS 'endTime', PROMOTION_CASHVOUCHE_ID AS 'promotionId' FROM e_customer_cashvouche WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = '' AND CASHVOUCHE_CODE != '' AND EFFECT_END_TIME > NOW() GROUP BY CASHVOUCHE_VALUE, SATISFY_LIMIT
